summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing an Easement Agreement with W.E. Ruth, and others, confirming and locating a private roadway together with storm drain across a portion of the City of Seattle's Lake Youngs Aqueduct Right of Way in the southeast quarter of the southwest quarter of Section 16, Township 22 North, Range 6 East, W.H., as reserved by judgment in King County Superior Court Cause No. 201476.
